channel.title: Seminars-2-2025 on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Seminars-2-2025 on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering

item.title: The Dawn of Low Latency and the Death of Bandwidth
item.description: Abstract # This seminar will explore how end user bandwidth capacity and latency affects the quality of end user application experiences.

item.title: 5 Key Pillars of Telco Cloud Evolution
item.description: Abstract # Network operators who manage private cloud infrastructure for hosting telecoms workloads and applications must continuously scale-up, optimise and adapt their platform to meet the needs of diverse “tenants” hosted on such infrastructure.

item.title: Open RAN: Technological Foundations and Market Dynamics
item.description: Abstract # This seminar explores the transformative potential of Open RAN, connecting technological insights with market dynamics.
